## GridProEventsAndCallbacks type

Grid Pro Events and Callbacks

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type GridProEventsAndCallbacks = OnlyFunctions<UntypeNonFunctions<GridOptions>>;
```

## Remarks

- This type is used to define the events and callbacks that can be passed to the grid
